strategy: Tyranid armies have a Strategy Rating of 1.
Initiative: The Cult Company and Cult Support formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. All other formations have an Initative Rating of 1+.

sections.name: Cult Host Formations
sections.description: One Patriarch Host formation must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Patriarch Host
formations.units: One Patriarch Brood Coven, three Genestealers, four Hybrid Acolytes
extraUnits: Add four Cult Limousines, four Ridgerunners: 150 points

formations.name: Cult Company
formations.units: One Cult Primus, nine Cult Infantry
extraUnits: Add two Cult Fire Support: 50 points
Add three Cult Leman Russ: 150 points

sections.name: Cult Vanguard Formations
sections.description: One Cult Vanguard formation may be taken for each Cult Host formation.

sections.name: Cult Ambush Formations
sections.description: One Cult Ambush formation may be taken for each Cult Vanguard formation.

sections.name: Cult Support Formations
sections.description: One Cult Support formation may be fielded per Cult Host formation.

formations.name: Cult Super Heavy Tanks
formations.units: One Cult Locus, two Cult Baneblades and/or Cult Shadowswords

formations.name: Cult Leman Russ Platoon
formations.units: One Cult Locus, six Cult Leman Russ

formations.name: Cult Basilisk Battery
formations.units: One Cult Locus, four Cult Basilisks

formations.name: Cult Mechanized Platoon
formations.units: One Cult Locus, six Cult Infantry, three Cult Chimeras

sections.name: Cult Air Support
sections.description: Up to a fifth of the points available may be spent on these formations.

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: Cult Transport
items.description: Add enough transports to transport the entire formation with no space left over.
